meanings.definition: One who shortens words or phrases.
meanings.sent1: The abbreviator quickly shortened the long words.
meanings.sent2: The abbreviator always makes our writing more concise.
meanings.sent3: The abbreviator had a magic wand that shrunk words instantly.
meanings.sent4: She was like an abbreviator, cutting through the unnecessary with precision.
meanings.sent5: The abbreviator's skill in shortening words amazed everyone.

meanings.definition: A person who reduces the length of a text.
meanings.sent1: As an abbreviator, he made the document much shorter.
meanings.sent2: The abbreviator helped make the book more readable.
meanings.sent3: The abbreviator's job was to make stories fit on a single page.
meanings.sent4: She worked like an abbreviator, trimming the excess words.
meanings.sent5: The abbreviator's edits transformed the text into a masterpiece.

meanings.definition: An official who shortens or condenses documents.
meanings.sent1: The abbreviator at the office made the report more concise.
meanings.sent2: The official abbreviator always met the deadline for shortening documents.
meanings.sent3: The abbreviator's desk was filled with papers waiting to be shortened.
meanings.sent4: She was known as the abbreviator queen in the office.
meanings.sent5: The abbreviator's red pen marked the sections to be condensed.
